A

AbstractFileSystemFactory - Class in net.krotscheck.jersey2.vfs2
This factory will inject a VFS file system instance into the jersey scope, as a singleton instance that you may resolve your own FileObjects from.

V

VFS2Feature - Class in net.krotscheck.jersey2.vfs2
This jersey2 feature provides various helper classes that may be used to access a virtual file system instance (as per apache commons-vfs2).
